enemytips: Wukong will often use Decoy after Nimbus Strike. Try delaying your abilities by a short amount of time to ensure that you're hitting the real Wukong.
Wukong becomes tougher to kill when surrounded by his enemies. Try to isolate him to gain an advantage.
name: Wukong
title: the Monkey King

passive.sanitizedDescription: Increases Wukong's Armor and Magic Resist for each nearby enemy champion.
passive.name: Stone Skin
passive.description: Increases Wukong's Armor and Magic Resist for each nearby enemy champion.

allytips: Decoy and Nimbus Strike work well together to quickly strike your enemy and get out before they can retaliate.
Try using Decoy near brush to make an enemy overreact to your movement.
lore: Wukong is a vastayan trickster who uses his strength, agility, and intelligence to confuse his opponents and gain the upper hand. After finding a lifelong friend in the warrior known as Master Yi, Wukong became the last student of the ancient martial art known as Wuju. Armed with an enchanted staff, Wukong seeks to prevent Ionia from falling to ruin.
blurb: Wukong is a vastayan trickster who uses his strength, agility, and intelligence to confuse his opponents and gain the upper hand. After finding a lifelong friend in the warrior known as Master Yi, Wukong became the last student of the ancient martial...

spells.description: Wukong's next attack deals additional physical damage, gains range, and reduces the enemy's Armor for a short duration.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Wukong's next attack deals additional physical damage, gains range, and reduces the enemy's Armor for a short duration.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Wukong's next attack gains {{ e4 }} range, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus physical damage and reduces the enemy's Armor by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Crushing Blow

spells.description: Wukong becomes Invisible for a short duration, leaving behind a decoy that will deal Magic Damage to enemies near it when Wukong's stealth expires.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Wukong becomes Invisible for a short duration, leaving behind a decoy that will deal Magic Damage to enemies near it when Wukong's stealth expires.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Wukong becomes Invisible for {{ e2 }} seconds, leaving behind a decoy that will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to enemies near it after {{ e2 }} seconds. Stealth - Invisible: Wukong can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight.
spells.tooltip:
Wukong becomes Invisible for {{ e2 }} seconds, leaving behind a decoy that will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to enemies near it after {{ e2 }} seconds.

Stealth - Invisible: Wukong can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight.
spells.name: Decoy

spells.description: Wukong dashes to target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies near his target, dealing physical damage to each enemy struck.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Wukong dashes to target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies near his target, dealing physical damage to each enemy struck.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Wukong dashes to target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies nearby. Each enemy struck takes {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. Wukong then gains {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.
spells.tooltip: Wukong dashes to target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies nearby. Each enemy struck takes {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. Wukong then gains {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.
spells.name: Nimbus Strike

spells.description: Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around, dealing damage and knocking up enemies. Wukong gains Movement Speed over the duration of the spell.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around, dealing damage and knocking up enemies. Wukong gains Movement Speed over the duration of the spell.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around for 4 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage per second to nearby enemies, knocking them up for {{ e4 }} second the first time they get hit. At the start, Wukong gains {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed, and he gains an additional {{ e3 }}% per second over the duration.
